TravelClaimInstructionDesc1: Dear Customer .. In case you need Assistance Before and While You are away Making a claim under this policy
TravelClaimInstructionDesc2: Please contact us using the appropriate telephone number shown below: For Medical and other Emergencies, please call our 24-hour helpline on: ISA Travel Assistant (24 hours)
TravelClaimInstructionDesc11: We wish you and your family good health and safety
